user@localhost:~/test$ singularity storage list
ID  Name   Type   Path  
1   name1  local  path  
    As Source: 
        ID  DeleteAfterExport  MaxSize  PieceSize  
        1   true               100      200        
    As Output: 
        ID  DeleteAfterExport  MaxSize  PieceSize  
        2   true               300      400        
2   name   local  path  

user@localhost:~/test$ singularity --verbose storage list
ID  Name   CreatedAt            UpdatedAt            Type   Path  Config  
1   name1  2023-04-05 06:07:08  2023-04-05 06:07:08  local  path  <nil>   
    As Source: 
        ID  CreatedAt            UpdatedAt            DeleteAfterExport  MaxSize  PieceSize  
        1   2023-04-05 06:07:08  2023-04-05 06:07:08  true               100      200        
    As Output: 
        ID  CreatedAt            UpdatedAt            DeleteAfterExport  MaxSize  PieceSize  
        2   2023-04-05 06:07:08  2023-04-05 06:07:08  true               300      400        
2   name   2023-04-05 06:07:08  2023-04-05 06:07:08  local  path  <nil>
